In the Tlatilco figurine shown, the artist created an effect of stylization through which of the following visual characteristics?

choices.label: Monochromatic coloration to give a smooth, even tone to the work
A static pose to create a sense of balance and harmony
Hierarchical scale to demonstrate the central importance of the figure
Exaggerated proportions that place an emphasis on truncated arms and expansive hips

topic.text: 1.2: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 5.B: In analyzing a work of art beyond the image set, explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
